sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import Head from 'next/head' import useTranslation from '../hooks/useTranslation' import { Container, AboutContainer, ArrowsImage, GoalImage, Page, Slogan, SubSlogan, Paragraph, Title, TextYellow, TextGreen, PlayerImage, MoneyContainer, TextPink, TextBlue, Prove, Bet365WhiteImage, FifaWhiteImage, ContainerImages, SeeImage, ContainerTitleAbout, ContainerTitleMarket, BoxTitleMarket, BoxTitleAbout, ContainerParagraphAbout, TitleIncrease, TitleIncreaseSpotlight, PlusImage, } from '../../styles/pages/Landing' import FifaWhite from '../../src/assets/fifa-white.svg' export const Landing = () => { const { t } = useTranslation() const presentation = t('presentation') const about = t('about') const market = t('market') const increase = t('increase') return ( Brother Bet {presentation.slogan} {presentation.sub_slogan} {about.slogan} {about.paragraph.one.part.one} {about.paragraph.one.part.two} {about.paragraph.one.part.three} {about.paragraph.one.part.four} {about.paragraph.one.part.five}
{about.paragraph.two.part.one} {about.paragraph.two.part.two} {about.paragraph.two.part.three} {market.slogan} {market.paragraph.one} {market.paragraph.two} {market.paragraph.three} {market.paragraph.four} {market.paragraph.five.part.one} {market.paragraph.five.part.two} {market.paragraph.five.part.three} {market.paragraph.six} {market.paragraph.seven}
{increase.slogan.part.one}
{increase.slogan.part.two}
{increase.slogan.part.three}
{increase.slogan.part.four} {increase.slogan.part.five}
{about.paragraph.one.part.two} {about.paragraph.one.part.three} {about.paragraph.one.part.four} {about.paragraph.one.part.five}
) }
